participant_1.background:
I like that my current job is mostly solitary.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
my favorite movie is the last of the mohicans.
I garden, because it allows me to connect with nature and reminds me of my childhood.
i live with a roommate.

participant_2.background:
I still have my stuffed bunny from childhood, even though I'm 30.
i am committed to the environment.
My favorite people are those who share my love of game shows and fashion.
i work in construction.
i like to make clothes.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
Hey! I'm just working on a new project I'm really excited about.
Oh cool! What kind of project?
I'm designing and making a new line of clothes.
That's awesome! What kind of clothes?
I'm making a line of sustainable clothes made from recycled materials.
Oh wow! That's great! I love that you're committed to the environment.
Thanks! I'm really passionate about it.
Me too! I try to live as sustainably as possible.
That's great! I'm always looking for ways to reduce my impact on the environment.
Me too! I've been composting for a few years now, and I'm trying to get my friends and family to start doing it too.
That's awesome! I wish I could compost, but I live in an apartment.
Oh, that's too bad. You can still recycle and reduce your waste, though!
Yeah, I try to do that as much as possible.
Good! I'm glad to hear that.
Me too! It's important to do what we can to protect the environment.
